DOC.brief_title: The Effects Exercise Training Community-dwelling Elderly With Sleep Disturbances With Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: This project conduct three year : In first year , investigator explore correlation sleep parameter , dietary behavior body composition community-dwelling elder . Two hundred elder recruit receive actigraph accelerometer recording , sleep quality questionnaire , bio-electrical impedance analysis , heart rate variability analysis , cognitive depression evaluation . Secondly , study evaluate efficacy possible mechanisms 24-week exercise training sleep disturbance patient . Sixty patient sleep disturbance elder randomize exercise group control group . Participants exercise group receive aerobic resistance exercise 3 time per week 24 week . The control receive sleep hygiene education consultation . All measurement perform described . Finally , 260 elder participate study receive 12-month follow-up assessment explore longitudinal impact sleep disturbance cardiorespiratory function , body composition metabolic function , long-term effect exercise training sleep disturbance patient . Investigators expect elder poor sleep quality low level health-related fitness metabolic function ; exercise training effective improve sleep quality , metabolic function general health elder sleep disturbance , effect sustain long period .
